oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Syair sindiran badan, manuscript, [183-]
Ballad of self-mockery
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The writing is in two columns within a border, 13 lines per column.
A colophon on f. 49v specifies only Singapore and Tuesday morning during the fasting month.
Paginated 1-36 in figures and 1-37 (wrongly) in Arabic.
MS Indo 13 (leaves 29-49). Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Malay poetry
